direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating a request/response related to connecting to a peer address.
Both methods handle error responses related to connection requests.
Both methods involve creating requests/responses related to connection bindings.

enhanced_by.reason: The connect request must be created before the response can be generated.
Error handling must be considered after attempting to create the connect response.
The connection bind response can be used to verify the state after creating the connect response.
